snippet.title: Official Sea of Thieves Gameplay Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
🏴‍☠️  A lot has changed since 2018! Check out the trailer for Sea of Thieves' latest update here: https://aka.ms/SoT_Latest 🏴‍☠️ 

Check out the new Sea of Thieves Progression system for 2021, Seasons! https://youtu.be/HytOXjggVY8

Learn everything you need to know about Sea of Thieves: https://youtu.be/kDL45ozaV3U

The first 1000 Days of Sea of Thieves, in video form: https://youtu.be/Y1i7tX-VS2E

--------------------------------------------------------------------

It's was almost here when we posted this! Sea of Thieves launched on Xbox One and Windows 10 PC on March 20th, 2018. Buy now at https://www.xbox.com/seaofthieves

----------------------------------------

Sea of Thieves Merch: https://www.raregames.store/sea-of-thieves

-----------------------------------------

Buy the game and forge your own legend: https://www.xbox.com/seaofthieves
Dive into the Sea of Thieves Forums: https://www.seaofthieves.com/forum
Follow Sea of Thieves on Twitter: https://twitter.com/SeaOfThieves
Like Sea of Thieves on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SeaOfThievesGame
Soak up Sea of Thieves sunsets on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/seaofthievesgame
Talk Sea of Thieves on Discord: https://discord.gg/seaofthieves

Xbox Live Gold required to play on Xbox One and Xbox Series X|S (sold separately).
